text: Costruzioni Italiane Serrature e Affini, also known by the acronym CISA, is an Italian manufacturer of locking and access control systems. ==History== Costruzioni Italiane Serrature e Affini was founded in Florence, by Luigi Bucci in 1926. The company is part of Allegion. Monday, 28 October 2019 ==References== Category:Lock manufacturers Category:Manufacturing companies of Italy Category:Manufacturing companies established in 1926 Category:Italian brands
title: Costruzioni Italiane Serrature e Affini
